title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When a file is already open and I select 'Open With...' and choose a different type of editor, nothing happens
EB: When a file is already open and I select 'Open With...' and choose a different type of editor, a new editor should open for the file
SR:
1. Open a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. The file should be opened in the scripted resource editor example
4. In the Navigator, select test.xml
5. Choose 'Open With...' and select 'Default Text Editor'
6. A new editor should be opened for the file with the default text editor
